short_summary: Seeking experienced operator/agency to act as General Sales Agents (GSA) specializing in South Korea travel trade sector
description: Marketing and Branding strategy (description of activities) (objective)
full_summary:
**General Sales Agent for South Korea**
========================================

**Reference Number**
-------------------

PW-22-01008755

**Amendment Number**
-------------------

1

**Publication Date**
-------------------

September 29, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

November 8, 2022, at 8:00 PM

**Tender Description**
---------------------

Destination Canada (DC) invites proposals from experienced marketing firms to serve as a General Sales Agent (GSA) in South Korea. The selected contractor will work with DC to promote Canadian tourism in South Korea, fostering partnerships with co-investors, industry partners, and travel providers. The GSA will provide travel trade education, key account management, media and public relations, social media, and market support services.

**Eligibility**
-----------------

The contract is open to Canadian companies with experience in marketing tourism in foreign markets. Firms must be able to provide a comprehensive marketing strategy for South Korea.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

* Proven experience with marketing tourism in foreign markets
* Ability to develop and implement a comprehensive marketing strategy for South Korea
* Existing partnerships with travel providers and co-investors

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Proposals must be submitted in English or French, according to the instructions outlined in the contract documents. Electronic submissions should be made via the Canada Buys website.

**Contract Information**
-----------------------

* Expected contract start date: [TBD]
* Expected contract end date: [TBD]

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Annie Kao, Procurement and Contracts
Phone: [None]
Email: procurement@destinationcanada.com

**Additional Documentation**
---------------------------

The tender documents are available for review at the Canada Buys website:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/76832b4f6a7370f9db832fede4191d44/dc-2022-ak-04_general_sales_agency_south_korea.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/d4add3fb28b7e61efeac9db13edf8561/dc-2022-ak-04_agent_general_des_ventes_en_coree_du_sud.pdf
* Contract agreement
* Supplements
* Addenda
Submit any questions or requests for clarification to the contract administrator through the Canada Buys website.
